Package com.bombinggames.wurfelengine.core

Class EngineView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bombinggames.wurfelengine.core.EngineView

  • public class EngineView
extends java.lang.Object
    A view which is not dependend on the currently active game. It can therefore be used to render in screen space and in the menus. Only one instance should be used.
    Since:
    1.2.26
